title: Moneyview spamming
selftext:
Spam calls are normal, happens all the time. But these guys have suddenly started calling 4-5 times a day instead of usual 1 time. I wrote them an email to stop spamming on my phone and this is their reply: register with us and then we will stop spamming. Never signed up or even visited their app or website. 
What options do I have?
comments: Congratulations! You just have them one more e-mail ID to spam.

And now you have their number. Play dirty, and spam them with whatever solutions you find.

Regards

Team Reddit
Bitch I ain't sharing my email with you
Bruh just start abusing them whenever they call you. Use the most foul expletives and insults u know
